features.text: Added date and time field types.
features.reasoning: Now you can set due dates, meeting dates, etc, on your blocks, and filter based on these values in your views.

bugs.text: Resolved an issue related to renaming possible values.
bugs.reasoning: When multiple possible values were renamed at once, under very rare circumstances all of your blocks could get changed to reflect the final possible value in the list.

bugs.text: Pressing enter when a term is in the search bar will now only jump to the top result when the search bar has focus.

tweaks.text: When navigating to a board from your browser bookmarks, if you're not logged in, you'll be prompted to log in and then be automatically redirected to your target board.
Improved performance when inside a view.
